verbose_text: Some strategies were aimed at increasing phytase activity in the feed by incubation of the feed in water before administration, or by addition of purified phytases, other projects were based on the use of GMO maize that accumulates fungal phytases in kernels [XREF_BIBR] or on the development of pigs engineered for the presence of phytases in the saliva [XREF_BIBR].
evidence: increasing phytase activity in the feed by incubation of the feed in water
